name: @assistant/desktop
description: Tauri desktop build for AI Assistant

scripts.pretauri:dev: npm run bundle -w @assistant/web-client && npm --prefix ../.. run build:plugins && node scripts/sync-plugin-assets.mjs
scripts.pretauri:build: npm run build -w @assistant/web-client && npm --prefix ../.. run build:plugins && node scripts/sync-plugin-assets.mjs
